normalization_note: Added explicit relationships[] arrays extracted from implicit fields (alleged_abusers, legal_representation, recruited_by) and summary text for CSV generation compatibility

profiles.name: Nadia Marcinkova
profiles.summary: Allegedly 'bought' from Yugoslavian parents by Epstein at age 14. Visa paid for by Epstein. Described as his 'lesbian sex slave'. Engaged in sexual activity with victims. Kept out of country in 2007 to avoid subpoena. Deposed April 13 2010. Got FAA license, trained at same school as Mohammed Atta. Company Aviloop 301 E 66th St.
profiles.training: Palm Beach Flight Training (Director: Marian Smith)

profiles.name: Johanna Sjoberg
profiles.summary: Met Prince Andrew Easter 2001 per affidavit. Maxwell and Virginia Roberts present plus other underage girls. Told press Prince Andrew groped her breast. Article broke Sept 23 2007.

profiles.name: L.M.
profiles.summary: Born 1988. Assaulted by Epstein 50+ times between Aug 2002 (age 13) and Sept 2005. Also abused by Alan Dershowitz. Pregnant at 16, Epstein bought registry gifts delivered to trailer home. Pressed charges with Palm Beach police. FBI victim notifications Jan 10 2008 and May 30 2008. Edwards represented in L.M. v. Jeffrey Epstein ($15M award). Filed federal suit July 7 2008 re NPA violation. Epstein sued L.M. and Edwards Dec 7 2009. Edwards filed summary judgment 2011 with 53 undisputed facts. Case ongoing.
legal_cases: Jeffrey Epstein v. Scott Rothstein, Bradley J. Edwards, and L.M. (Dec 7 2009)

profiles.name: Haley Robson
profiles.summary: Daughter of retired Florida policeman. Born April 9 1986 in rural Loxahatchee. Finished high school, enrolled Palm Beach Community College. Met Epstein around 2004. Of Royal Palm Beach. Worked at Olive Garden in Wellington. Journalism major at PBCC when questioned by police.

profiles.name: Rachel Chandler
profiles.education: Brentwood School, Westside Los Angeles (graduated June 2005)
profiles.summary: Graduated Brentwood School June 2005. Descendant of Otis Chandler (LA Times owner). Childhood friends with Paris Hilton. Works as photographer, recently connected to occultist Marina Abramovic. Married Tom Guiness 2012.

profiles.name: Maximila Cordero
profiles.summary: Born 1983. JE victim in NYC. In complaint (Cordero v. Epstein) alleges Epstein told her during massage 'I love how young you are. You have a tight butt like a baby'. Filed suit against NY Post for slander/defamation (Ava v. NYP Holdings, Inc.)

profiles.name: Adriana Ross Muscinska
profiles.summary: Born 1983. Invited by Elite Models, moved to Miami from Poland Fall 2002. Hired at Epstein's Florida mansion, organized daily massage rituals. Married Duncan Ross July 12 2003. Began working as JE's assistant late 2004. Received Grand Jury investigation letter Aug 31 2007. Got bachelors from Miami Dade College 2008. Deposed March 15 2010. Residence: 1040 South Shore Drive Miami (alleged to have hidden evidence).

relationships.name: Jeffrey Epstein
relationships.context: Assistant and co-conspirator, organized daily massage rituals, worked late 2004+

profiles.name: Emmy Taylor
profiles.summary: Born 1975. British actress. Close to Ghislaine Maxwell. Alleged to be Maxwell's 'sex slave'. Has address linked to Oxford. July 16 2001 flight from Santa Fe NM to Teterboro NJ with Epstein, Maxwell, Roberts. Refused to comment on relationship.
flights: July 16 2001: Santa Fe NM to Teterboro NJ with Epstein, Maxwell, Roberts

relationships.name: Ghislaine Maxwell

profiles.name: Alfredo Rodriguez
profiles.summary: JE's house manager. Deposed Aug 7 2009. After deposition attempted to sell 97-page document appropriated from Epstein's computer containing telephone directory and list of apparent young girls in various locations. FBI undercover employee set up meeting, exchanged $50k buy money for document. FBI arrested Rodriguez for obstruction of justice. Sentenced to 18 months in prison (U.S. v. Rodriguez, No. 9:10-CR-80015-KAM). Later discovered DOJ had another copy. Died Dec 2014 at 60 from mesothelioma.
legal_cases: U.S. v. Rodriguez, No. 9:10-CR-80015-KAM (obstruction of justice, 18 months prison)
